data.meta_description: Département Boaco Localisation : Country Nicaragua, Department Boaco. Major cities : Boaco, Camoapa, Teustepe, San Lorenzo, Santa Lucía and San José de los Remates. Available Information : Population, Area, Altitude, Weather, Climate and Hotel. - City, Town and Village of the world
data.text:
Hotel Yolaina

Managua

Hotel Yolaina is located in the suburbs of Managua, 10 minutes’ drive from the city centre. The property has an outdoor pool, and offers free breakfast with the rate. Free Wi-Fi access is available... view morefrom

$US 40Hotel Alhambra

Granada

This colonial-style hotel is centrally located in front of the Granada Central Park and 1.5 km from the Nicaragua Lake. It features free Wi-Fi throughout the property, a swimming pool and gardens... view morefrom

$US 90Hotel Holy

Managua

Featuring simple décor, Hotel Holy is located near Managua City Centre and offers guests free daily breakfast and private parking. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. The rooms at Hotel Holy come with a cable TV and a wardrobe... view morefrom

$US 25Crowne Plaza Managua

Managua

An outdoor pool, conference centre and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi can be found at the Crowne Plaza Managua. Situated 12 km from Managua Airport, it offers a free local area shuttle... view morefrom
